pr_title: [FLINK-16172][build] Add baseline set of allowed unused dependencies

timeline.message: [FLINK-16172][build] Add baseline set of allowed unused dependencies
[FLINK-16173][build] Reduce noise for used undeclared dependencies

timeline.bodyText: Is there a shortcut to ignore dependencies in test scope?
timeline.author: StephanEwen
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1676,6 +1676,44 @@ under the License.
 							<version>1.11.1</version>
 						</dependency>
 					</dependencies>
+					<configuration>
+						<ignoredUsedUndeclaredDependencies combine.children="append">
+							<!-- allow using transitive Flink dependencies for brevity -->
+							<dependency>org.apache.flink:*</dependency>

replies.bodyText: not sure, but I would advice against it anyway since unused test dependencies are also problematic form a maintenance perspective as the still restrict the dependency graph (in case of Flink dependencies) and can introduce dependency conflicts.
replies.author: zentol
